targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time, '1s'),
  name,
  avg((fields -> 'val') :: float) AS val
FROM
  sensors
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND name IN ('SIM_TIME')
GROUP BY
  1,
  name
ORDER BY
  name ASC,
  $__timeGroup(time, '1s')

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time, '1s'),
  name,
  avg((fields -> 'val') :: float) AS val
FROM
  sensors
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND name IN ('SIM_TIME')
GROUP BY
  1,
  name
ORDER BY
  name ASC,
  $__timeGroup(time, '1s')

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time, '1s'),
  name,
  max((fields -> 'val') :: float) AS val
FROM
  sensors
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND name LIKE '%MODE%'
GROUP BY
  1,
  name
ORDER BY
  name ASC,
  $__timeGroup(time, '1s')

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time, '1s'),
  name,
  avg((fields -> 'val') :: float) AS val
FROM
  sensors
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND name LIKE '%XMEAS_7%'
GROUP BY
  1,
  name
ORDER BY
  name ASC,
  $__timeGroup(time, '1s')

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time, '1s'),
  name,
  avg((fields -> 'val') :: float) AS val
FROM
  sensors
WHERE

  AND name IN ('XMEAS_40', 'XMEAS_41', 'MODE')

ORDER BY
